div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1845 Bajaur, Gandhara, Pakistan, 1926 Burial: 2nd cent. B.C. (Le Rider) Contents: 970+ AR Menander: 1 tetradr.; 721 dr. Apollodotus I: 95 dr. Antimachus II: 152 dr. Zoilus I: 1 dr. Disposition: Sotheby, April 30, 1958 (Haughton), nos. 408, 410, 415, 417, 451 Martin, JASB Numismatic Supplement (1926-7), pp. 18 ff. Haughton, NC 1946, p. 141
